Package ch.icclab.cyclops.dashboard.bills

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bill
    This class is a high-level abstraction of a bill
    BillGenerator
    The BillGenerator handles the creation of bill PDFs
    BillInformation
    Handles the server call that requests information about all the bills for a specific user.
    Billing
    This class handles / forwards the call concerning billing information to the billing microservice
    BillPDF
    This class handles all the REST calls concerning bill PDFs.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PdfGenerationException
